channel.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b] SkyRune is a server made from the Project Insanity base. I am still cleaning it and this thread won't be updated until I've started coding it. I will be developing SkyRune™ with [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=454522]WowILikeToCode[/url] and we are just focusing on the main things, and not really worrying about adding content just at this time. We are focusing on loading and saving and the more important things. Feel free to contact either one of us if you would like any information.
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/attack.png[/img] [b]Links[/b] Forums - No link added until it's been verified. YouTube - No link added until it's been verified. Twitter - No link added until it's been verified.
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/combat.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b] [COLOR=Red]All special attacks[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Clipping[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Correct timers[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Equipment effects (barrows)[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]PvN[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]PvP[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Weapon degrading (barrows)[/COLOR]

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Thanks everyone, me and WowILikeToCode have started on Prayer. We are perfecting all skills at the moment so that’s where all our concentration is. We thank you all for encouraging us and we will be producing awesome updates. If anyone can help me find a decent Client please shoot me a Pm.

After skills;

[ul][li]Perfecting Timers[/li]
[li]Starting on PvM[/li]
[li]Starting on PvP[/li]
[li]Cleaning all un needed code.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Talked with you on Skype & saw progress on RuneCrafting, it’s coming along nicely. Good luck ;), I’ll be following this.

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

Good luck with the development, Skyro. Lets hope it’ll be a successful one.

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:437532”]]custom idea:

-required to mine “stones”
-required to use a chisel and a hammer on the stone to make the rune essence
-you can use the spell “charge” on the rune essence to make it pure essence
-rune essence gives the regular rs style amount
-pure essence gives 50% more

Also,

I suggest swapping the levels somewhat. I have always found 77 being the highest rc item sort of frustrating. Make bloods be like 85. and @ 92 when you can do double natures make it so the double natures actually give double experience. (just for the natures!)[/quote]
Thanks for the idea man, I will talk to WowILikeToCode about it and we will decide. I don’t think we will add this though, but we are adding 100% mining so we will have pure essences mining and stuff. We are still working on Runecrafting to make it best as possible. Just trying to find a decent Client.

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“SilesX, post:14, topic:437532”]#Supported
Hope it turns out alot better then most of the projects now Of days[/quote]
Now “A” days.

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRune™ | Where dreams are reality
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:15, topic:437532”]Thanks guys, we have started on Runecrafting.[/quote]custom idea:

-required to mine “stones”
-required to use a chisel and a hammer on the stone to make the rune essence
-you can use the spell “charge” on the rune essence to make it pure essence
-rune essence gives the regular rs style amount
-pure essence gives 50% more

Also,

I suggest swapping the levels somewhat. I have always found 77 being the highest rc item sort of frustrating. Make bloods be like 85. and @ 92 when you can do double natures make it so the double natures actually give double experience. (just for the natures!)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:4, topic:437532”][quote author=XxAndyxX link=topic=540238.msg3955993#msg3955993 date=1332756856]
LOOKS AWESOME!
[/quote]
??? there are not even pictures…

anyway. good luck i guess, hate it when people stick with pi but whatever.[/quote]

Anyone can post pictures of another PI but this will be way more epic than any PI

Awsome =

Weapon degrading (barrows)
Dwarf cannon
All obstacles
Stews
Pies
Pizzaz
Potato Toppings
All fish can be caught
Bait checking
Equipment checking
Fishing spots around the world
Moving fishing spots
Whirlpools
Weapon poisoning
thats only half the post and i dont wanna spam so if you need help https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540238.msg3956002.html#msg3956002!!! how can he even post pictures when nothings been done yet… Im really excited to see how this turns out!

@Skyro wrote:

Introduction
SkyRune is a server made from the Project Insanity base. I am still cleaning it and this thread won’t be updated until I’ve started coding it. I will be developing SkyRune™ with WowILikeToCode and we are just focusing on the main things, and not really worrying about adding content just at this time. We are focusing on loading and saving and the more important things. Feel free to contact either one of us if you would like any information.
